quotes.quote: Through historical accident, we've ended up with a global network that pretty much allows anybody to communicate with anyone else at any time.
What men call accident is God's own part.
Accident is as much a part of fiction as anything else, symbolic of the grace that, along with will, conspires to put words on the page.
Accident is veiled necessity.
Accident is simply unforeseen order.
Slightest accidents open up new worlds.
There are no accidents without intentions.
Some things happen by accident - embrace them.
Accidents will occur in the best-regulated families.
Name the greatest of all inventors. Accident.
There is no such thing as accident; it is fate misnamed.
Sometimes an accident can be an unhappy womans best friend.
Follow the accident, fear the fixed plan--that is the rule.
There are no such things as accidents. Only fate redesigned.
It's not an accident that successful people read more books.
There is no accident, just as there is no beginning and no end.
Accidents ambush the unsuspecting, often violently, just like love.
There are too many accidents that can befall life on a single planet.
Accidents are not accidents but precise arrivals at the wrong right time.
It is always an accident that saves us. It is someone we have never seen.
Accidents don't happen to people who take accidents as a personal insult.
The sweet accident of coincidence is the best foundation on which to build.
Accidents, try to change them - it's impossible. The accidental reveals man.
Accident ruled every corner of the universe except the chambers of the human heart.
There are no accidents... there is only some purpose that we haven't yet understood.
I don't believe in accidents. There are only encounters in history. There are no accidents.
If you go around looking for accidents, asking for them, they can't be called accidents any more.
Accidents are just from where you're looking; to the ego, it looks like it's miracles and accidents.
Accident counts for as much in companionship as in marriage.
It was an accident of circumstance that I never married.
Almost all accidents take place because of human distraction.
Accident is design / And design is accident / In a cloud of unknowing.
Every accident, no matter how minor, is a failure of the organization.
Through pure accident of birth, I've managed to stay relatively youthful.
There is no accident in our choice of reading. All our sources are related.
The different accidents of life are not so changeable as the feelings of human nature.
Accidents, and particularly street and highway accidents, do not happen - they are caused.
It was not by accident that the greatest thinkers of all ages were deeply religious souls.
There would be far fewer accidents if we could only teach telephone poles to be more careful.
If the accident of genes has put you in a place where you can be a role model, then be somebody!
